Documentation.short_help: PassThrough filter from the Point Cloud Library (PCL).

StringVectorProperty.name: FilterFieldName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Provide the name of the field to be used for filtering data.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FilterLimits
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the numerical limits for the field for filtering data.

IntVectorProperty.name: FilterLimitsNegative
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set to true if we want to return the data outside the interval specified by setFilterLimits (min, max).
